title: Wall of Eyes: On Film
overview: A compilation of music videos and films directed by Paul Thomas Anderson for Thom Yorke´s various projects, including never before seen footage of The Smile newest album recording sessions, "Wall of Eyes" & "Friend of a Friend" music videos,  Radiohead´s "Daydreaming", "Present Tense" & "The Numbers" music videos, so as Netflix dance film "ANIMA" from Yorke´s solo project.
synopsis: A compilation of music videos and films directed by Paul Thomas Anderson for Thom Yorke´s various projects, including never before seen footage of The Smile newest album recording sessions, "Wall of Eyes" & "Friend of a Friend" music videos,  Radiohead´s "Daydreaming", "Present Tense" & "The Numbers" music videos, so as Netflix dance film "ANIMA" from Yorke´s solo project.
